title: Christina Aguilera - Keeps Gettin' Better (A Decade Of Hits)s
description:
[img]http://images.play.com/covers/6184615x.jpg[/img]

Keeps Gettin&#039; Better (A Decade of Hits) is a greatest hits collection that showcases superstar singer-songwriter Christina Aguilera&#039;s rise from bubblegum pop princess to five-time Grammy Award winning soprano. Through a blistering collection of old, new, and re-recorded tracks Christina Aguilera belts her way through a spectrum of hits, ranging from sugar-coated delights to futuristic electronic confections.

An unmistakeable vocal range and ever changing style has seen Christina Aguilera gain global success over her ten year career. From the palpable teen pop of her first single &#039;Genie in a Bottle&#039; to the 1920s Jazz inspired &#039;Ain&#039;t No Other Man&#039; Christina Aguilera has constantly reinvented her style and sound to earn her status as one of the biggest names in Pop. Featuring tracks handpicked from all three of the songstress&#039; studio albums, including Stripped and Back to Basics, Keeps Gettin&#039; Better for the first time documents Christina Aguilera&#039;s career progression in one scorching compilation. Alongside a host of unmistakeable hits including &#039;Fighter&#039;, &#039;Hurt&#039;, and &#039;Dirrty&#039;, Keeps Gettin&#039; Better also gives an insight in to what Christina Aguilera has to offer in the future in the shape of two new electro-pop inspired tracks &#039;Keeps Gettin&#039; Better&#039; and &#039;Dynamite&#039;.

The reworked versions of old favourites &#039;Genie 2.0&#039; and &#039;You Are What You Are (Beautiful)&#039; are packed full of new dance-inspired beats that act as a fitting link between Christina Aguilera&#039;s established and future hits. Documenting Christina Aguilera&#039;s innovative style progression, Keeps Gettin&#039; Better will satisfy established fans with previous hits and tantalise everyone with what Christina Aguilera has lined-up for the future.

   1. Genie In A Bottle
   2. What A Girl Wants
   3. I Turn To You
   4. Come On Over (All I Want Is You)
   5. Nobody Wants To Be Lonely (Duet With Ricky Martin)
   6. Lady M
   7. Dirrty
   8. Fighter
   9. Beautiful
  10. The Voice Within (Bonus Track)
  11. Ain&#039;t No Other Man
  12. Candyman
  13. Hurt
  14. Genie 2.0
  15. Keeps Gettin&#039; Better
  16. Dynamite
  17. You Are What You Are (Beautiful)
